## Legend

> See also [](CTT-Content.md) for more information and strategies.

### Listeners

**Topic** searches for usages inside existing implementations of open-source IntelliJ Platform plugins
via [IntelliJ Platform Explorer](https://jb.gg/ipe).

**Listener** links corresponding listener to implement.

See [](CTT-Content.md) on how to register listeners.

### Extension Points

**Extension Point** searches for usages inside existing implementations of open-source IntelliJ Platform plugins
via [IntelliJ Platform Explorer](https://jb.gg/ipe).

**Implementation** is the related Extension Point class.

See [](CTT-Content.md) on how to declare extensions in your plugin.

## DUPLICATE Legend

### DUPLICATE Listeners

**Topic** searches for usages inside existing implementations of open-source IntelliJ Platform plugins
via [IntelliJ Platform Explorer](https://jb.gg/ipe).

**Listener** links corresponding listener to implement.

See [](CTT-Content.md) on how to register listeners.

### DUPLICATE Extension Points

**Extension Point** searches for usages inside existing implementations of open-source IntelliJ Platform plugins
via [IntelliJ Platform Explorer](https://jb.gg/ipe).

**Implementation** is the related Extension Point class.

See [](CTT-Content.md) on how to declare extensions in your plugin.
